EMPLOYEE ENGAGEMENT
Allegiant conducts an employee engagement survey 
every 24 months to gauge team members’ sentiment 
across all work groups and locations. Departments 
occasionally conduct additional surveys related to culture 
or communications to gauge team-specific feedback.
We completed our latest company- wide survey in
